subs.text: Whenever I see photos of someone at a food festival or a food court and all the food they ate, I assume they only took one or two bites, since it‚Äôs almost always an incredible amount of food that one person can‚Äôt possibly eat on their own. [link]

subs.text: September 12

@Bill2K MLB does recaps (3-4 minute highlight packages) and the 7-8 minute condensed games, and they‚Äôre really good, but they‚Äôre still never as good as Blue Jays in 30. It feels like something to make time for and eat snacks while watching.
subs.rawText: @Bill2K MLB does recaps (3-4 minute highlight packages) and the 7-8 minute condensed games, and they‚Äôre really good, but they‚Äôre still never as good as Blue Jays in 30. It feels like something to make time for and eat snacks while watching.

subs.text: After every Toronto Blue Jays game, Sportsnet (the TV network owned by the same parent company as the baseball team) produces a half-an-hour distillation called Blue Jays in 30. I want that for every event that‚Äôs 3 hours or longer.
subs.rawText: After every Toronto Blue Jays game, Sportsnet (the TV network owned by the same parent company as the baseball team) produces a half-an-hour distillation called Blue Jays in 30. I want that for every event that‚Äôs 3 hours or longer.

subs.text: @BombasticDave @dlbno Of course. I also have no knowledge of or plans to, nor a desire to, implement a single misfortune, much less 6 misfortunes. All I‚Äôm stating are the odds of them happening, no more, no less.
subs.rawText: @BombasticDave @dlbno Of course. I also have no knowledge of or plans to, nor a desire to, implement a single misfortune, much less 6 misfortunes. All I‚Äôm stating are the odds of them happening, no more, no less.

subs.text: @dlbno For that to happen, the Royal Family would have to fall victim to 6 separate misfortunes and would be unable to reign. But that will never happen. 3 misfortunes? That‚Äôs possible. 5 misfortunes? There‚Äôs an outside chance. But 6 misfortunes? I‚Äôd like to see that.

subs.text: I went to bed last night angry and sad about how unfair it was that I didn‚Äôt get to see my mother for over a year and a half before she died, but glad at all the time I had to talk with her up until the end.

subs.text: Anyway, if you need me to be angry and sad about something, it‚Äôll have to compete with that.

subs.text: September 5

My handsome heroism last night at the Wu-Tang Clan concert was to zip up the backpack of a quite intoxicated woman. (I wonder how long she went with it open. It takes Torontonians a really long time to point something like that out.) I got a friendly pat on the shoulder for that.
